<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Helper function to build a wide generic register \\p DstReg of type \\p</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// RegTy from smaller parts. This will produce a G&#95;MERGE&#95;VALUES,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// G&#95;BUILD&#95;VECTOR, G&#95;CONCAT&#95;VECTORS, or sequence of G&#95;INSERT as appropriate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for the types.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p PartRegs must be registers of type \\p PartTy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If \\p ResultTy does not evenly break into \\p PartTy sized pieces, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// remainder must be specified with \\p LeftoverRegs of type \\p LeftoverTy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> insertParts(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> DstReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> ResultTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> PartTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Register&gt;</a> PartRegs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> LeftoverTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Register&gt;</a> LeftoverRegs = &#123;&#125;);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Handles most opcodes. Split \\p MI into same instruction on sub-vectors or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// scalars with \\p NumElts elements (1 for scalar). Supports uneven splits:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// there can be leftover sub-vector with fewer then \\p NumElts or a leftover</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// scalar. To avoid this use moreElements first and set MI number of elements</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to multiple of \\p NumElts. Non-vector operands that should be used on all</span></CodeLine>
